name: Grand Hotel du Palais Royal
description: Set within an 18th-century building, the Grand Hotel is located in the heart of Paris, 200 metres from the Louvre museum and Tuileries Gardens. It features fine works of art, a spa by Holidermie, à la carte restaurant and 24-hour reception. The designer rooms at Grand Hotel Palais Royal include a minibar, free Wi-Fi, en suite facilities and a HD flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms have a balcony with views Paris' monuments. Grand Hôtel Du Palais Royal serves a daily American-style buffet breakfast, which can be taken in the guest room upon request. Guests can also enjoy fine dining in the restaurant or relax with a drink in the hotel's bar. The Palais Royal-Musée du Louvre Metro station (line 1) is only 150 metres from the hotel and provides direct access to the Champs-Elysées, Place de la Concorde and Arc de Triomphe. Charles-de-Gaulle Airport is 23 km away.

name: Grand Powers
description: Located in Paris' Golden Triangle, Grand Powers is a 5-star boutique hotel in the 8th arrondissement. Guests staying at the hotel can enjoy the spa which has a Turkish bath, a sauna and a hot tub. Some rooms and suites at the Grand Powers are decorated with parquet and a chimney, and some offer a balcony and views of the Eiffel Tower. Each room has a Smart TV and a Nespresso coffee machine, and the bathrooms have Dyptique toiletries. The hotel serves an American buffet breakfast each morning. Guests can dine and enjoy a drink in the Café 52 restaurant and bar. The Clefs d’Or Concierge at the hotel can provide tips on the area. The Champs-Elysées is 250 metres from Grand Powers and Avenue Montaigne is 350 metres away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Maison Breguet
description: Maison Bréguet is a hotel with a restaurant and a bar in Paris, 500 metres from Place de la Bastille. Guests can enjoy massages and use the fitness centre in this 5-star hotel. All rooms have air-conditioning and soundproofing. The private bathrooms have either a bath or a shower and include free toiletries and slippers. Each room has a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property and the restaurant specialises in French cuisine. Other facilities at Maison Bréguet include a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and a garden. A laundry service is available for a fee and there is also a business centre. Opéra Bastille is 650 metres from Maison Bréguet, while Place de la République is a 17-minute walk from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 18 km away.

name: Hotel Square
description: Hotel Square is a 5-star boutique hotel in Paris, opposite the Eiffel Tower. It offers elegant rooms and suites with air-conditioning, flat-screen TV with international channels and free Wi-Fi. Beaugrenelle Shopping Centre is a 7-minute walk away and Rue de Passy is 1 km from the hotel. The guestrooms and suites also offer elegant marble bathrooms with bathtub and shower. A Hi-Fi stereo with a CD player, minibar and work desk can also be found in the rooms. There are 2 lounge areas in the Square where guests can relax in front of a large, plasma-screen TV with cable channels. Upon advanced request, the lounges can be used for private receptions. Spa Nuxe is 200m² and offers a variety of well-being and relaxation treatments including massage, a range of beauty treatments and much more. The nearest metro stations are Javel Metro Station, an 11-minute walk from Hotel Square and Passy Metro Station, 14 minutes' walk from the property. RER train station Avenue du Président Kennedy is a 5-minute walk from the property. The hotel has its own parking garage.

name: Hyatt Paris Madeleine
description: Hyatt Paris Madeleine is located in central Paris, a 5-minute walk from Madeleine. It features a fitness and spa centre with sauna and massage treatments. Each air-conditioned room is individually decorated and has luxury modern wooden furnishings in light coloured tones. They have views over the Parisian Streets or the courtyard. They also feature a suite bathroom with a bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Le Cafe M restaurant serves breakfast and lunches prepared with seasonal produce. La Chinoiserie serves fresh, local cuisine and a gourmet dinner. It also offers snacks and drinks. Hyatt Paris Madeleine is situated a 5-minute walk from the famous shopping district Boulevard Haussmann, and 10-minutes from the Champs-Élysées. Saint-Augustin Metro Station is 500 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to all of Paris’s famous sites.

name: Hotel Parister & Spa
description: Located in Paris, a 2-minute walk from Cadet Metro Station and the Folies Bergère Theatre, and 1.2 km from Opera Garnier, Hotel Parister & Spa features restaurant and a bar, as well as a spa center with a swimming-pool, hammam and a fitness centre available for free. The air-conditioned rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. They all have a Marshall speaker and a private bathroom with free Nuxe toiletries, bathrobes and slippers, while some features a spa bath. Hotel Parister & Spa features free WiFi throughout the property. Breakfast are available each morning from 7am to 10am and until 10.30am on Sunday. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Sacré-Coeur is 1.3 km from Hotel Parister & Spa. Paris - Orly Airport is 16 km away.

name: Majestic Hotel - Spa Champs Elysées
description: This 5-star hotel is located in Paris’s 16th district just 400 metres from Place de l'Étoile and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and guests have free access to the spa facilities. Rooms at Majestic Hotel Spa combine old Parisian style and more contemporary pieces of art. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom. Some rooms and suites have a private terrace or kitchenette. Wi-Fi access is available in all the rooms and the hotel also has facilities for disabled guests. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées wellness spa has a swimming pool, hammam and fitness room. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées is 190 metres from Kléber Metro Station (line 6) and 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro (lines 1, 2 and 6). The Eiffel Tower is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and the Champs Elysées is 5 minutes away.
